newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan construction stocks up on recovery hopes.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan construction stocks up on recovery hopes.

text.p: Taiwan's construction stock rose in early Friday trade as investors picked up hopes for an industry recovery, brokers said.
After one hour, Bao-Chen Construction was the most active issue, rising 60 cents or 3.33 percent to T$18.6, followed by Prince Housing which gained 60 cents or 2.41 percent to T$25.5.

The domestic construction industry, which was in a slump in the past years, is widely expected to recovery after the government said it would speed up public construction to boost slow economy at home, brokers said.- Taipei Newsroom(2-5080815)
